name: Fine Folks, Inc.
description: Provider of online kids apparel. The company provides basics like onesies, t-shirts, socks and leggings. It also creates custom packages for its members based on their child's age, color preferences and geographic location.
one_liner: Provider of online kids apparel. The company provides basics like onesies, t-shirts, socks and leggings. It also creates custom packages for its members based on their child's age, color preferences and geographic location.
